TopicTitle: KSP Quick Reference (for when updates break your mods!)

Articles.Content:
I made this so I wouldn't have to keep Alt+Tabing over to the wiki.

KSP Quick Reference (.pdf)

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bx48K2LhgPnsZExaVUEwR0ZCQmM/edit?usp=sharing

KSP Quick Reference (.pub)

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bx48K2LhgPnsTW02ME50bXQ4WlpzMWJKTzdOTl9IMGt3ZWxV/edit?usp=sharing

Hohmann Transfer Transparencies

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bx48K2LhgPnsT0ZCZ2UwWjVLSDlfZ24wMnBUZFZONERrREVJ/edit?usp=sharing

Aerobraking Tables

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bx48K2LhgPnsakFJV0RKQjBMREwxMkswcTFRVk1SVTB2dVhn/edit?usp=sharing

Launch Window Tables

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bx48K2LhgPnsc05yU01rZjNWVThqSUFBRU5tZXk3Qno0cWtn/edit?usp=sharing

When printing the guide make sure the printer flips the page the right way, and don't worry about the pages not lining up, they will when you stack them and fold it in half.

They are all open for editing if you see an error. I've been working on it on and off for a couple months now, so it would make me happy if other people used them too.

Album here!

http://imgur.com/a/LEp65
